{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3290056,"name":"Justin Fischer","username":"justfishin99","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/j/a9adbd/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-01-20T18:32:42.893Z","cooked":"

relative encoder on a falcon 500 value doesn’t wrap in smart dashboard, but would seem like it actually does based on the fact the swerve drive is working fine. haven’t tried anything with auto/path planner yet.
